cards.title: Printing artifact not collected, so printing security and reliability risks can't be evaluated.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Printing artifact not collected, so printing security and reliability risks can't be evaluated.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Printing artifact not collected, so printing security and reliability risks can't be evaluated.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Generic misconfiguration
steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.

cards.title: Printer queues offline, so print jobs cannot reach the device.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Printer queues offline, so print jobs cannot reach the device.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Printer queues offline, so print jobs cannot reach the device.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Queue outage
steps: Restart the Print Spooler service, confirm device connectivity, and reapply printer defaults if needed.

cards.title: Stuck print jobs delaying documents, so users wait hours for output.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Stuck print jobs delaying documents, so users wait hours for output.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Stuck print jobs delaying documents, so users wait hours for output.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Jammed print queue
steps: Purge the queue, clear the "PRINTERS" spool folder, and confirm the driver or device is responsive.

cards.title: Printer driver packages tied to troubled queues, so driver conflicts may disrupt printing.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Printer driver packages tied to troubled queues, so driver conflicts may disrupt printing.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Printer driver packages tied to troubled queues, so driver conflicts may disrupt printing.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Driver remediation
steps: Verify driver versions, install vendor-certified packages, or migrate affected queues to a class driver.
